ResearchProjectDef.label: liandry coilgun
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables the construction of the Liandry Coilgun, a huge mounted coilgun that can fire through mountains.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blessing of Zir ritual
ResearchProjectDef.description: Investigate the ritual that grants the Blessing of Zir at the cost of a human sacrifice. Enables you to build the Ritual Core.

ResearchProjectDef.label: alloy forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how the build the forge, a building that allows you to create powerful metal alloys.
